build.setting:
{"key":"reg_rules","default":"

Please take a moment to review these rules.<\/p>

Please remember that we are not responsible for any messages posted. We do not vouch for or warrant the accuracy, completeness or usefulness of any message, and are not responsible for the contents of any message.<\/p>

The messages express the views of the author of the message, not necessarily the views of this website. Any user who feels that a posted message is objectionable is encouraged to contact us immediately by email. We have the ability to remove objectionable messages and we will make every effort to do so, within a reasonable time frame, if we determine that removal is necessary.<\/p>

You agree, through your use of this service, that you will not use this website to post any material which is knowingly false and\/or defamatory, inaccurate, abusive, vulgar, hateful, harassing, obscene, profane, sexually oriented, threatening, invasive of a person's privacy, or otherwise violative of any law.<\/p>

You agree not to post any copyrighted material unless the copyright is owned by you or by this website.<\/p>

Our software uses cookies to distinguish you from other users of our website. This helps us to provide you with a personalized experience when you browse this site.<\/p>","report":"bool"}
build.acpsearch: {"lang_key":"menu__core_discovery_search","restriction":"search_manage","keywords":["rebuild search","rebuild search index","reindex","reindex search","reindex search results","search","search index","search index rebuild","searching"]}

build.themeeditorsetting: {"key":"set__i-default-scheme","type":"select","name":"Default color scheme","desc":"What color scheme should be shown to new users? If users have already chosen a preference, this setting won't affect them.","refresh":false,"options":[["system","System (auto)"],["light","Light"],["dark","Dark"]],"default":"system","cat":"lightDarkMode"}
{"key":"set__i-logo-text","type":"text","name":"Text Logo","desc":"The text logo is used if an image logo hasn't been uploaded.","refresh":false,"default":"{setting='board_name'}","cat":"textLogo"}

{"key":"set__i-mobile-icons-location","type":"select","name":"Navigation icon location","desc":"The navigation icons provide convenient access to your navigation menu and account menu on small devices.","refresh":true,"options":[["header","Header"],["footer","Footer"]],"default":"footer","cat":"mobileNavigation"}

{"key":"layout_global_view_mode","type":"select","name":"Page Layout","desc":"<strong>Classic<\/strong> is the traditional layout, with a horizontal header. <strong>Side Panel<\/strong> moves the logo and navigation into a vertical panel on the side of your page.","refresh":true,"options":[["default","Classic"],["side","Side panel"]],"default":"default","cat":"pageLayouts"}

{"key":"set__i-change-scheme","type":"checkbox","name":"Display color scheme toggle?","desc":"If enabled, users can choose their own preference between Light, Dark and System.","refresh":false,"default":"1","cat":"lightDarkMode"}

{"key":"set__i-font-size","type":"range","name":"Font-size","desc":"Set the base font-size for typography. Some elements will use a smaller or larger version of this base size to maintain hierarchy.","refresh":false,"min":"12","max":"18","step":".25","default":"14","cat":"typography"}

{"key":"set__i-logo--he","type":"range","name":"Maximum logo height (%)","desc":"Adjust the max-height of your desktop logo.","refresh":false,"min":10,"max":100,"step":1,"default":"70","cat":"imageLogoDesktop"}

{"key":"set__i-link-panels","type":"checkbox","name":"Enable clickable panels?","desc":"Clickable panels increase the click size of entries inside tables and grids.","refresh":false,"default":"1","cat":"contentBoxes"}

{"key":"set__i-sidebar-ui-logo--he","type":"range","name":"Maximum logo height (%)","desc":"Adjust the max-height of your side panel logo.","refresh":false,"min":10,"max":100,"step":1,"default":"70","cat":"imageLogoDesktop"}

{"key":"set__i-desktop-logo--fo-si","type":"range","name":"Desktop font-size (px)","desc":"Adjust the font-size of your text logo on the desktop layout.","refresh":false,"min":"10","max":"50","default":"18","cat":"textLogo"}

{"key":"set__i-sidebar-ui-logo--fo-si","type":"range","name":"Desktop font-size (px)","desc":"Adjust the font-size of your text logo on the desktop sidebar layout.","refresh":false,"min":"10","max":"50","default":"20","cat":"textLogo"}

{"key":"set__i-mobile-logo--fo-si","type":"range","name":"Mobile font-size (px)","desc":"Adjust the font-size of your text logo on the mobile layout.","refresh":false,"min":10,"max":50,"step":1,"default":"18","cat":"textLogo"}

{"key":"set__i-user-content-font-size","type":"range","name":"User content font-size (%)","desc":"Increase the font-size of user submitted content, such as posts.","refresh":false,"min":100,"max":150,"step":1,"default":"110","cat":"typography"}
